mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT event.ems_id FROM VL_EMS_EVENT AS event INNER JOIN IS_WARDCAR AS car ON event.car_id = car.car_id WHERE proc_cd not in ('02','03') AND car.car_id = #{car_id} ORDER BY event.ems_id DESC ) AS t LIMIT 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT event.ems_id FROM VL_EMS_EVENT AS event INNER JOIN IS_WARDCAR AS car ON event.car_id = car.car_id WHERE proc_cd not in ('02','03') AND car.car_no = #{car_no} ORDER BY event.ems_id DESC ) AS t LIMIT 1
